TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-P2-TNSSELECT descriptive_flex_context_code, application_column_name, end_user_column_name FROM fnd_descr_flex_col_usage_vl WHERE 1=1 --and descriptive_flex_context_code = 'Global Data Elements' --AND default_type = 'C' --constant AND descriptive_flexfield_name = 'FA_ADDITIONS' --AND application_column_name in ( 'ATTRIBUTE20', 'ATTRIBUTE21', 'ATTRIBUTE22') order by descriptive_flex_context_code, application_column_name
